ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T19:12:40 [Issue ID 4000-47625] urn:comicvine:4000-47625 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 12:54:56. [Issue ID 64689]
ComicInfo.Summary: Overview The explosive finale to the first Shockrockets story arc and the flip book debut of Superstar, the much-anticipated new superhero from Busiek & Immonen! The power-hungry General Korda makes his move -- and no one has a chance of stopping him but the shattered, demoralized Shockrockets squadron. And that's no chance at all -- unless Alejandro Cruz, the newest of the Shockrocket pilots, can succeed where the finest military minds on Earth have failed, and find a way to defeat Korda's super-weapons. It's do or die -- with a world at stake. Also: Enter Superstar! For him, fame is power -- literally. But how far will he go to keep that power? An all-new five-page flip book story. And as always, both stories are New Reader Friendly. Flip covers by Immonen and von Grawbadger.
ComicInfo.Title: The Darkest Hour...
